snippet: There is plenty of allure, challenge and excitement to living abroad, but those with a proclivity for homesickness can find themselves awash in it during the holiday season. Have you spent your holidays overseas, as a student, on a work assignment,...
abstract: There is plenty of allure, challenge and excitement to living abroad, but those with a proclivity for homesickness can find themselves awash in it during the holiday season. Have you spent your holidays overseas, as a student, on a work assignment, or by choice? Where did you go? How did you celebrate? Tell us your stories. And tell us your stories of going back home too. We'll post our favorites during these last weeks of 2012.

headline.main: Home for the Holidays, or Not: Tell Us Your Stories
